docs.lead_paragraph: It seems incredible that human nature should fall to such depths of unnatural wickedness as to be willing to inflict a slow, painful death upon a little child for the sake of obtaining a few dollars. Yet not only in England, where for years such atrocious cruelty has been practiced extensively, but in this country, too, it has reached a stage that has attracted serious attention.

headline.main: CHILD LIFE INSURANCE; The System Calls for Persistent Watching to be Safe. A TEMPTATION TO INHUMAN CRIMES How Its Evil Side Developed -- England's Appalling Experience -- Legislative Action in This Country.
